OOC: Megs + co. saw the Rogues in action briefly when they destroyed 
Burrock and wounded Tyreal at the Pred base.  Meggy being the 
knowledgeable fellow he is, it would surprise me to find that he 
DIDN'T know of such notorious criminals - and he should be able to 
put two and two together.  At the very least he knows that there's 
another group present with heavy firepower and sneaky tactics - which 
should be right up his alley.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Hydras --
> 
> Megatron's thoughts pause for a second... "An agreement with the 
> Maximals? I don't think they'd agree to anything but our utter and 
> complete surrender, and the feeling is mutual."
> 
> ooC: I can't remember if the Predacons have met the Rogues, or the 
> nWo, so if they haven't met either or, then ignore the following. =)
> 
> "What if we were to convinced one of the other factions on the 
> planet to keep the Maximals busy while we destroy Cyngar...
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> > "Yes I agree. I believe we may be able to reach an agreement with 
> them. If we 
> > say were no longer the two evils we once were we might be able to 
> hold off a 
> > maximal attack for a little while longer. Enough to rid us of 
> Cyngar."
